need to know 3 stitches start by working on the diagonal in single_crochet rib pattern to create a parallelogram seam the ends of the parallelogram together to form a tube then fill in the crown with spiral rounds of regular single_crochet copyright by entrelac cat updated october 2023 crochet biased beanie page 1 of 7 abbreviations beg beginning blo back loop only chain chain flo front loop only lp loop prev previous rem remain round round rs right side single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch tc turning chain ws wrong side yo yarn over techniques single_crochet rib pattern insert hook into back loop only of st when making a single_crochet decrease decrease insert hook in next st yo and draw up a loop insert hook in following st yo and draw up a loop yo and draw yarn through all 3 loops on hook 1 st decreased work even do not increase or decrease the number of sts notes * us crochet abbreviations/terminology used in this pattern * turning chain does not count as a stitch when making the brim * the crown is crocheted in a spiral do not join with a slip_stitch at end of round or make a beginning chain at start of round * crown is worked in regular single_crochet insert hook under both loops of st * be careful at the end of rs row final single_crochet in row is sometimes obscured join the parallelogram into a tube fold the piece in half with wrong sides together so you re holding the final row and the foundation row parallel remove hook from live loop insert hook into flo of 1st single_crochet on foundation row grab live loop and pull it through the single_crochet st to join the 2 pieces together insert hook into flo of 2nd st on front piece and blo of 1st st on back piece yo and draw yarn through all 3 lps on hook to make a slip st continue to slip_stitch the 2 edges together working through flo on front piece and blo on back piece until 1 st rem on front piece on back piece skip 1 st then slip_stitch the final st on front piece together with final st on back piece chain 1 rotate the piece clockwise you will make the crown by crocheting along the top edge of the tube copyright by entrelac cat updated october 2023 crochet biased beanie
